questions: What is the cause of the "Failed to index document" error in ?
How to resolve the "Failed to index document" error in ?
What data type should be sent to  to avoid the "Failed to index document" error?
answer:
# What causes the "Failed to index document" error in , and how can it be solved?
The "Failed to index document" error occurs when there is a conflict in the schema between the data being sent to
 and the existing data in . This conflict arises when the data type being sent conflicts with the
existing data type. To resolve this error, ensure that the data being sent matches the expected data type defined in the
 schema.
